Name: Locked
About the game: A visual novel depicting a hero called Maks, who is seeking for a waitress which he hasn’t seen for more than a month. Maks has recently finished his studies and is desperately trying to sort out his life. He visits a bar, “The Polaroid”, regularly to get drunk and chat with a ginger haired, pretty waitress, which he is afraid to ask out on a date. Then one day he doesn’t find her at the bar and decides to go look for her. Intuition brought him to a mystery mansion; a place of gossip and criminal tales. Will Maks find the stranger and unravel the mystery of the cursed mansion? Game features: Detailed description of the main characters - bold red headed Hoshi and modest cute Maks. An unpredictable storyline with freedom of choice, which can lead to different endings. Atmospheric music - from classics to modern electric. Animated “life-like” characters. An intriguing and touching story, which won’t take more than an hour to finish.
